answerText: Eva Luna[10] This Chilean author of The House of the Spirits wrote Eva Luna.

question: Question: In this novel, the Revolt of the Whores forces La Se√±ora to abandon the title character. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel, whose title woman is conceived by Consuelo when she sleeps with an Indian gardener who was bitten by a snake.
